## Properties

| Property      | Attribute      | Description                             | Type                  | Default          |
| ------------- | -------------- | --------------------------------------- | --------------------- | ---------------- |
| `color`       | `color`        | a CSS variable starting with `--mf-c-*` | `string`              | `'currentColor'` |
| `gradient`    | `gradient`     | a CSS variable starting with `--mf-g-*` | `string \| undefined` | `undefined`      |
| `icon`        | `icon`         | The icon ID                             | `string`              | `undefined`      |
| `marginLeft`  | `margin-left`  |                                         | `boolean`             | `false`          |
| `marginRight` | `margin-right` |                                         | `boolean`             | `false`          |
| `title`       | `title`        |                                         | `string`              | `undefined`      |
